title: Soul (2020 film)
summary: Soul is a 2020 American computer-animated film written and directed by Pete Docter. It stars the voices of Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House, Alice Braga, Richard Ayoade, Phylicia Rashad, Donnell Rawlings, Questlove, and Angela Bassett. The film centers on a music teacher Joe Gardner (Foxx) seeking to reunite his soul and his body after they are accidentally separated, just before his big break as a jazz musician.
